<S%G1161>But<s%> I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2745>boasting<s%> <S%G5228>on<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> behalf may <S%G3361>not<s%> be in <S%G2758>vain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>respect,<s%> <S%G2443>that,<s%> just <S%G2531>as<s%> I <S%G3004>said,<s%> you <S%G3903>may<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3903>prepared,<s%>

seeing <S%G1223>that<s%> through the <S%G1382>proof<s%> given by <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>service,<s%> they <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G5292>obedience<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3671>confession<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for the <S%G572>liberality<s%> of your <S%G2842>contribution<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>all;<s%>
